Structure# BindTarget.IkSolverPath

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
struct IkSolverPath
```

[`case opacity`](/documentation/realitykit/bindtarget/opacity)An option that specifies that the entity’s opacity to animate. Requires that the entity has an OpacityComponent[`case billboardBlendFactor`](/documentation/realitykit/bindtarget/billboardblendfactor)[`case blendShapeWeights`](/documentation/realitykit/bindtarget/blendshapeweights)An option the entity’s blend shape weights animate.
